import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/IframeView" />

# Default Iframe View Factory

```jsx
const DefaultIframeViewFactory = (props) => {

	const {Component = IframeView, ...otherProps} = props;

	const IframeViewComponent = withResponsiveHeight(Component);

	return (
		<IframeViewComponent {...otherProps}/>
	);
};
```
